name: Paperless-ngx
author: Daniel Quinn, Jonas Winkler, and the Paperless-ngx team
description: Paperless-ngx is a community-supported open-source document management system that transforms your physical documents into a searchable online archive so you can keep, well, less paper.

form_fields.label: Administrator Username
form_fields.hint: Username for the paperless-ngx admin user

form_fields.label: Administrator Password
form_fields.hint: Password for the paperless-ngx admin user

form_fields.label: Enable Tika Server
form_fields.hint: Enable Tika server for parsing and converting Office documents (.doc, .xlsx, .odt). Requires more resources.

form_fields.label: Application Timezone
form_fields.hint: Timezone for the application (e.g., Europe/Paris, America/New_York)

form_fields.label: OCR Languages
form_fields.hint: Available OCR languages (e.g., fra+eng+deu for French, English and German)

form_fields.label: Primary OCR Language
form_fields.hint: Primary language for OCR processing

form_fields.label: OCR Deskew
form_fields.hint: Enable automatic deskewing of scanned documents

form_fields.label: OCR Clean Mode
form_fields.hint: OCR preprocessing mode for better text recognition

form_fields.label: Enable Barcodes
form_fields.hint: Allow document processing using barcodes

form_fields.label: Enable ASN Barcodes
form_fields.hint: Enable Archive Serial Number (ASN) barcode processing

form_fields.label: ASN Barcode Prefix
form_fields.hint: Prefix for Archive Serial Number barcodes

form_fields.label: Barcode String
form_fields.hint: String to identify documents for barcode processing

form_fields.label: Consumer Polling Interval
form_fields.hint: Polling interval in seconds for document consumption

form_fields.label: Delete Duplicates
form_fields.hint: Automatically delete duplicate documents during consumption

form_fields.label: Recursive Consumption
form_fields.hint: Process documents in subdirectories recursively

form_fields.label: Subdirs as Tags
form_fields.hint: Use subdirectory names as document tags

form_fields.label: Task Workers
form_fields.hint: Number of parallel workers for document processing

form_fields.label: Threads per Worker
form_fields.hint: Number of threads per worker for document processing

form_fields.label: Enable Update Check
form_fields.hint: Allow Paperless to check for updates

form_fields.label: Remove None from Filename
form_fields.hint: Remove 'None' values from generated filenames

form_fields.label: Secret Key
form_fields.hint: Django secret key for encryption (leave empty for auto-generation)
